law.catch_line: The Commission shall appoint an Executive Secretary....

text.section: The Commission shall appoint an Executive Secretary.
The Executive Secretary serves at the pleasure of the Commission.

With the approval of the Commission and in conformity with Title 10, Subtitle 6, Part V of the State Government Article, the Executive Secretary may destroy any record or document that the Commission possesses, including a record or document required by law to be filed with the Commission, if:
the record or document has been on file for at least 3 years; and
the Executive Secretary considers the document to be obsolete.
